list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: concerning the writing, study, or content of literature, especially of the kind valued for quality of form.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the great literary works of the nineteenth century
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các tác phẩm văn học vĩ đại của thế kỷ XIX

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of language) associated with literary works or other formal writing; having a marked style intended to create a particular emotional effect.
